description.en:
Value. The cost of quality. Quality "gurus". The core ideas of quality management and other quality development, measurement and assessment concepts. Tools and techniques of quality management. Quality awards. Quality programs, certifications and standards for spa hotels, resorts, day spas, etc.
Models and examples of how to measure and assess service quality, and wellness and spa customer satisfaction. External and internal customer expectations, needs and wishes. Customer feedback system, empowerment, service guarantees and service recovery. Wellness and spa quality trends.
description.et:
Kvaliteedikäsitluste areng ja suundumused. Kvaliteedigurud. Kvaliteedijuhtimise põhimõtted ja töövahendid. Tuntumad kvaliteedijuhtimise programmid ja -auhinnad. Tuntumad spaavalkonna kvaliteediprogrammid, -auhinnad ja -standardid.
Kvaliteedi mõõtmine ja hindamine. Sise- ja väliskliendid, nende ootused ja vajadused. Klientide tagasisidesüsteem. Heaolu- ja spaavalkonna kvaliteedisuundumused.

objectives.en:
The general objective of the course is to support learning contemporary knowledge and skills to understand and use the quality management concepts, principles, models, programmes, techniques and tools as drivers of sustainable business, the success of the wellness and spa business, and service quality improvement.
Students will develop their quality- and service-oriented thinking, attitudes and skills of critical thinking, analysing and abilities to work with quality-related theoretical sources.
objectives.et: Ainekursuse eesmärgiks on, et üliõpilased omandavad alusteadmised ja tervikarusaama kvaliteedijuhtimise käsitlustest, põhimõtetest, mõttelaadist,  kvaliteediauhindadest, programmidest, mudelitest ja töövahenditest ning õpivad tundma ja oskavad analüüsida nende eripära  ja rakendusvõimalusi heaolu- ja spaavaldkonnas.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the course the student:
1) knows and understands quality management tools and techniques;
learning_outcomes.et: 1)  mõistab ja oskab analüüsida kvaliteedi ja kvaliteedijuhtimise käsitlusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) knows the quality awards in the world;
3) knows and understands quality certification and standards for spas /spa hotels (medical spa, spa, wellness spa);
learning_outcomes.et: 3) teab maailmas tuntumaid kvaliteediprogramme ja auhindu;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) knows the models and instruments for measuring and assessing wellness and spa customer satisfaction;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) teab tuntumaid ravispaade, spaade ja heaoluspaade kvaliteedisüsteeme ja vastavaid nõudeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) critically analyse different quality management aspects, and wellness and spa service quality aspects;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) tunneb olulisemaid külastajate rahulolu ja kvaliteedi mõõtmise ja hindamise meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) substantiate the selection of the quality management, measurement and assessment methods, tools and techniques, compile an article about wellness and spa quality management.
learning_outcomes.et: 6) oskab leida ja kasutada kvaliteedijuhtimist käsitlevaid teadusartikleid ning koostada vastavat ülevaateartiklit.

independent_work.en:
To complete the course, it is necessary to participate in lectures and seminars and complete the assignments.
The detailed instructions for the assignments can be found in Moodle.
1. Discovering quality tools and techniques. Group work.
Groups prepare a presentation of 2 quality tools/techniques and introduce them to the class.
2. Compiling a review article. Individual work.
The student analyses 3 scientific articles related to service quality management / measurement from the past 5 years, and compiles a review article based on them according to the given structure. 
The student presents an overview of the findings. 
3. Analysis of spa quality management. Group work.
Groups analyse a spa service according to a studied quality tool/technique, and present the analysis to the class.
4. Reflection of learning. Individual work.
The student reflects on his / her learning and acquired knowledge in this subject. The outcome of the reflection is a written reflection and poster presentation. Alternative option - write an opinion essay and present it to the group.
5. Knowledge check/test. Individual work.
The student performs the test in Moodle to consolidate the knowledge about quality management.
